pullrequest.title: Make Github DSL class aware of diferent repositories not only gazebo_ros_pkgs

content.raw:
Not sure if there were builds already triggered for this, but I started a couple just to check:

* `ariac-ci-pr_any-docker_kinetic-xenial-amd64` [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ariac-ci-pr_any-docker_kinetic-xenial-amd64&build=16)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ariac-ci-pr_any-docker_kinetic-xenial-amd64/16/)
* `ros_gazebo9_pkgs-ci-pr_any_kinetic-xenial-amd64` [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ros_gazebo9_pkgs-ci-pr_any_kinetic-xenial-amd64&build=80)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros_gazebo9_pkgs-ci-pr_any_kinetic-xenial-amd64/80/)

Were these supposed to pass?
